g.text: MRI Scheduling - view on data sent to MoH
check appointment dates (with 1..* providers), can email
return possible dates (1..* dates), by phone, can take a few days
filled form 17 with all details (such as procedure code)
Send: HMO_code, ID_Type_code, Patient_Encrypt_ID, Population_group_code, Birth_Date
send report (if provider and HMO are the same)
send report (if provider and HMO are different)
